caption.p: Bias correction for temperature. a Boxplot of temperature changes with (red)/without (blue) bias correction for the three scenarios. b As in a but for absolute temperature. Solid dots in the first columns represent the observations (averaged over 1980â€“1999). The boxes indicate 10%-quantile, 25%-quantile, median, 75%-quantile, and 90%-quantile, respectively. Solid triangles stand for the respective multi-model mean
